18constexpr uint faceempty = 0;
19constexpr uint facesolid = 0x80808080;
99class cube
100{
101 public:
102 cube *children;
103 cubeext *ext;
104 union
105 {
106 uchar edges[12];
108 uint faces[3];
109 };
110 ushort texture[6];
111 ushort material;
112 uchar merged;
113 union
114 {
115 uchar escaped;
116 uchar visible;
117 };
124 bool isempty() const
125 {
126 return faces[0]==faceempty;
127 }
128
132 bool issolid() const
133 {
134 return faces[0]==facesolid &&
135 faces[1]==facesolid &&
136 faces[2]==facesolid; //check all three
137 }
138

174 void calcmerges(cube * root);

182 bool isvalidcube() const;

185
186 struct facebounds
187 {
188 ushort u1, u2, v1, v2;
189
190 bool empty() const
191 {
192 return u1 >= u2 || v1 >= v2;
193 }
194 };
195 struct pvert
196 {
197 ushort x, y;
198
199 pvert() {}
200 pvert(ushort x, ushort y) : x(x), y(y) {}
201
202 bool operator==(const pvert &o) const
203 {
204 return x == o.x && y == o.y;
205 }
206 bool operator!=(const pvert &o) const
207 {
208 return x != o.x || y != o.y;
209 }
210 };
211
212 struct pedge
213 {
214 pvert from, to;
215
216 pedge() {}
217 pedge(const pvert &from, const pvert &to) : from(from), to(to) {}
218
219 bool operator==(const pedge &o) const
220 {
221 return from == o.from && to == o.to;
222 }
223 bool operator!=(const pedge &o) const
224 {
225 return from != o.from || to != o.to;
226 }
227 };
228
229 class plink : public pedge
230 {
231 public:
232 int polys[2];
233
234 plink()
235 {
236 clear();
237 }
238
239 plink(const pedge &p) : pedge(p)
240 {
241 clear();
242 }
243 private:
244 void clear()
245 {
246 polys[0] = polys[1] = -1;
247 }
248 };
249

259 };

295struct selinfo
296{
297 int corner;
298 int cx, cxs, cy, cys;
299 ivec o,
300 s;
301 int grid,
302 orient;
303 selinfo() : corner(0), cx(0), cxs(0), cy(0), cys(0), o(0, 0, 0), s(0, 0, 0), grid(8), orient(0) {}
304
314 int size() const
315 {
316 return s.x*s.y*s.z;
317 }
318
326 int us(int d) const
327 {
328 return s[d]*grid;
329 }
330
338 bool operator==(const selinfo &sel) const
339 {
340 return o==sel.o && s==sel.s && grid==sel.grid && orient==sel.orient;
341 }
342
348 bool validate();
349};
350
356struct block3
357{
358 ivec o, s;
359 int grid, orient;
360 block3() {}
361 block3(const selinfo &sel) : o(sel.o), s(sel.s), grid(sel.grid), orient(sel.orient) {}
362
363 const cube *getcube() const
364 {
365 return reinterpret_cast<const cube *>(this+1);
366 }
367
368 cube *c()
369 {
370 return reinterpret_cast<cube *>(this+1);
371 }
372
373 int size() const
374 {
375 return s.x*s.y*s.z;
376 }
377};
378
379struct editinfo
380{
381 block3 *copy;
382 editinfo() : copy(nullptr) {}
383};

385struct undoent
386{
387 int i;
388 entity e;
389};
390
391struct undoblock
392{
393 undoblock *prev, *next;
394 int size,
395 timestamp,
396 numents;
398 block3 *block()
399 {
400 return reinterpret_cast<block3 *>(this + 1);
401 }
402
403 uchar *gridmap()
404 {
405 block3 *ub = block();
406 return reinterpret_cast<uchar *>(ub->c() + ub->size());
407 }
408
409 undoent *ents()
410 {
411 return reinterpret_cast<undoent *>(this + 1);
412 }
413};

415extern int selchildcount, selchildmat;

420inline void setcubefaces(cube &c, uint face)
421{
422 c.faces[0] = c.faces[1] = c.faces[2] = face;
423}
424
425#define EDGE_GET(edge, coord) ((coord) ? (edge)>>4 : (edge)&0xF)
426#define EDGE_SET(edge, coord, val) ((edge) = ((coord) ? ((edge)&0xF)|((val)<<4) : ((edge)&0xF0)|(val)))
427
428#define CUBE_EDGE(c, d, x, y) ((c).edges[(((d)<<2)+((y)<<1)+(x))])
429
430inline int octadim(int d)
431{
432 return 1<<d;
433}
434
435//note that these macros actually loop in the opposite order: e.g. loopxy runs a for loop of x inside y
436#define LOOP_XY(b) for(int y = 0; y < (b).s[C[DIMENSION((b).orient)]]; ++y) for(int x = 0; x < (b).s[R[DIMENSION((b).orient)]]; ++x)
437#define LOOP_XYZ(b, r, f) { for(int z = 0; z < (b).s[D[DIMENSION((b).orient)]]; ++z) LOOP_XY((b)) { cube &c = blockcube(x,y,z,b,r); f; } }
438#define LOOP_SEL_XYZ(f) { if(local) makeundo(); LOOP_XYZ(sel, sel.grid, f); rootworld.changed(sel); }
439#define SELECT_CUBE(x, y, z) blockcube(x, y, z, sel, sel.grid)
440
441// guard against subdivision
442#define PROTECT_SEL(f) { undoblock *_u = newundocube(sel); f; if(_u) { pasteundoblock(_u->block(), _u->gridmap()); freeundo(_u); } }
443
444#define DIMENSION(orient) ((orient)>>1)
445#define DIM_COORD(orient) ((orient)&1)

607 struct emptycube : cube
608 {
609 emptycube()
610 {
611 children = nullptr;
612 ext = nullptr;
613 visible = 0;
614 merged = 0;
615 material = 0;
616 setcubefaces(*this, faceempty);
617 for(int i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
618 {
619 texture[i] = 0;
620 }
621 }
622 } emptycube;

624 struct mapheader
625 {
626 char magic[4]; // "TMAP"
627 int version; // any >8bit quantity is little endian
628 int headersize; // sizeof(header)
629 int worldsize;
630 int numents;
631 int numpvs; // no longer used, kept for backwards compatibility
632 int blendmap; // also no longer used
633 int numvars;
634 int numvslots;
635 };
636
637 struct octaheader
638 {
639 char magic[4]; // "OCTA"
640 int version; // any >8bit quantity is little endian
641 int headersize; // sizeof(header)
642 int worldsize;
643 int numents;
644 int numvars;
645 int numvslots;
646 };
653 void octarender();
654 void seedparticles();
655 void makeparticles(const entity &e);
656
661 void resetmap();
662 void resetclipplanes();
663
675 void savec(const cube * const c, const ivec &o, int size, stream * const f);
676
687 bool loadmapheader(stream *f, const char *ogzname, mapheader &hdr, octaheader &ohdr);

697 void setmapfilenames(const char *fname, const char *cname = nullptr);
